name: seasonal-fruits
description: Displays season fruits based on US regions

scripts.install-packages: npm install && ((cd backend && npm install) & (cd frontend && npm install))
scripts.dev: concurrently "cd backend && npm run dev" "cd frontend && npm start"
scripts.build: npm run install-packages && cd frontend && npm run build
scripts.deploy: npm run build && concurrently "cd backend && npm run start" "cd frontend && npx serve -s build"

author: Alex Man && Mark Vong
